medical_history.chief_complaint: Six days of abdominal pain, nausea, and emesis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was in his usual state of health until six days prior to admission, when he developed abdominal pain and nausea. He has had a few episodes of non-bilious, non-bloody emesis but reports that his appetite has recently returned. He also mentions intermittent fevers and chills, and ongoing diarrhea. He denies any urinary symptoms.
